mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `article` (uid, gid, title, content, pic_url, created_time, update_time) VALUE (#{uid}, #{gid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pic_url}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, uid, u.nick authorName, u.avatar_pic_url authorAvatar, gid, title, content, pic_url picUrl, a.created_time createdTime FROM article a INNER JOIN `user` u ON a.uid=u.id WHERE a.id=#{id}
SELECT id, uid, gid, title, content, pic_url picUrl, created_time createdTime FROM article WHERE gid=#{gid} LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
